bitfield.description: Always read as 0. [[br]]Writes have no affect.
Wakeup generation for HW Pen event.

bitenum.description: SW steps are pre-empted by HW events
SW steps are not pre-empted by HW events
Map HW event to HW event input
Map HW event to Pen touch irq (from AFE)

bitfield.description: These two bits are sent directly to the AFE Pen Ctrl inputs. [[br]]Bit 6 controls the Wiper touch (5 wire modes). [[br]]Bit 5 controls the X+ touch (4 wire modes). [[br]]User also needs to make sure the ground path is connected properly for pen interrupt to occur (using the StepConfig registers). [[br]]Refer to section 4 interrupts for more information.

bitenum.description: Write 1 to power down AFE (the tsc_adc_ss enable (bit 0) should also be set to off)

bitfield.description: Select Bias to AFE. [[br]]0 = Internal. [[br]]1 = Reserved.

bitenum.description: Step configuration registers are not protected (writable)
Step configuration registers are protected (not writable)

bitfield.description: Writing 1 to this bit will store the Step ID number with the captured ADC data in the FIFO.

TSC_ADC_SS module enable bit. [[br]]After programming all the steps and configuration registers, write a 1 to this bit to turn on TSC_ADC_SS. [[br]]Writing a 0 will disable the module (after the current conversion).

register.description: General Status bits for Sequencer Status

bitfield.description: Status of OCP FSM and ADC FSM. [[br]]

register.description: High and Low Range Threshold for ADC Range Check

bitfield.description: Sampled ADC data is compared to this value. [[br]]If the sampled data is greater than the value, then an interrupt is generated.
Sampled ADC data is compared to this value. [[br]]If the sampled data is less than the value, then an interrupt is generated.
The input ADC clock will be divided by this value and sent to the AFE. [[br]]Program to the value minus 1
Connected to AFE Spare Output pins. [[br]]Reserved in normal operation.
Connected to AFE Spare Input pins. [[br]]Reserved in normal operation.
SEL_INP pins SW configuration. [[br]]Note values 1xxx (binary) = VREFN.
SEL_INM pins for neg differential. [[br]]Note all values 1xxx (binary) = VREFN.
SEL_RFP pins SW configuration. [[br]]Note all values 1xx (binary) = Reserved.
SEL_INP pins SW configuration. [[br]]Note all values 1xxx (binary) = VREFN.
SEL_INM pins for neg differential. [[br]]Note all values 1xxx (binary) = VREFN.
SEL_RFP pins SW configuration. [[br]]Note all values 1xx (binary) = INTREF.
Program the # of ADC clock cycles to wait between applying the step configuration registers and going back to the IDLE state. [[br]](Value must be greater than 0.)
Optional ID tag of channel that captured the data. [[br]]If tag option is disabled, these bits will be 0.
12 bit sampled ADC converted data value stored in FIFO 0.
Optional ID tag of channel that captured the data. [[br]]If tag option is disabled, these bits will be 0.
12 bit sampled ADC converted data value stored in FIFO 1.
